message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something a bit more reasonable. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $85?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we split the difference and settle at $90?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $87?
